ygData.subject: Re: BBC at level 1.
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, the same thing happened to me on a rusty 2-H I had when I was low level. I had to jump start the skill with about 6 or 8 points before it even started
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, the same thing happened to me on a rusty 2-H I had when I was low level. I
had to jump start the skill with about 6 or 8 points before it even started
advancing. Not sure why though.


"Mifsud, Michael" wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> I noticed something curious yesterday. My level 23rd character has a bbc, I
> never use it, but I dont want to give it away either. I started another
> warrior and gave her the BBC. I wanted to keep both my 1hslash and 2hslash
> nice and high with this character.
>
> After 2 levels my 2hand slash NEVER went up. I did put a practice point in
> it as well, seems odd. New programming for powerful items?
